title: Print Hello World
description: Write a program that prints 'Hello World' to the console.

title: Even or Odd
description: Check whether a given integer is even or odd.

starterCodes.codeTemplate: public class Main{public static void main(String[] args){java.util.Scanner sc=new java.util.Scanner(System.in);int n=sc.nextInt();}}
function main(){const fs=require('fs');let n=parseInt(fs.readFileSync(0,'utf8'));}main();

title: Maximum of Two Numbers
description: Find the maximum of two integers.

starterCodes.codeTemplate: public class Main{public static void main(String[] args){java.util.Scanner sc=new java.util.Scanner(System.in);int a=sc.nextInt(),b=sc.nextInt();}}
function main(){const fs=require('fs');let [a,b]=fs.readFileSync(0,'utf8').trim().split(' ').map(Number);}main();

title: Sum of Digits
description: Find the sum of digits of a number.

starterCodes.codeTemplate: public class Main{public static void main(String[] args){java.util.Scanner sc=new java.util.Scanner(System.in);int n=sc.nextInt();}}
function main(){const fs=require('fs');let n=fs.readFileSync(0,'utf8').trim();}main();

function main(){const fs=require('fs');let s=fs.readFileSync(0,'utf8').trim();}main();

title: Count Even Numbers
description: Count total even numbers in given list.
inputFormat: First line N. Second line N integers.

starterCodes.codeTemplate: public class Main{public static void main(String[] args){java.util.Scanner sc=new java.util.Scanner(System.in);int n=sc.nextInt();int[] a=new int[n];for(int i=0;i<n;i++)a[i]=sc.nextInt();}}
function main(){const fs=require('fs');let data=fs.readFileSync(0,'utf8').trim().split(/\s+/);}main();

function main(){const fs=require('fs');let s=fs.readFileSync(0,'utf8').trim();}main();

title: Find Minimum in Array

function main(){const fs=require('fs');let data=fs.readFileSync(0,'utf8').trim().split(/\s+/);}main();

title: Find Missing Number
description: Find missing number from 1 to N.

starterCodes.codeTemplate:

arr=list(map(int,input().split()))
print('')

import java.util.*;
public class Main{public static void main(String[] args){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int n=sc.nextInt();int[] a=new int[n-1];for(int i=0;i<n-1;i++)a[i]=sc.nextInt();System.out.println("");}}

title: Longest Subarray With Sum K

arr=list(map(int,input().split()))
print('')

public class Main{public static void main(String[] args){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int n=sc.nextInt(),k=sc.nextInt();int[] a=new int[n];for(int i=0;i<n;i++)a[i]=sc.nextInt();System.out.println("");}}
const input=require('fs').readFileSync(0,'utf8').trim().split(/\s+/);console.log('');
